ContactTitle: Do you have further questions? Feel free to contact us.
content: If you need additional information or have any questions, we invite you to contact Project Accessibility Foundation. Our dedicated team is ready to assist you. Below, you'll find our contact details:
additionalText: We look forward to hearing from you and are happy to help. You can reach us via email, phone, or visit us at the provided address.
StatusGood: Your message has been sent successfully.
StatusBad: An error occurred while sending your message.
